content: I seem to remember that the contraints table used to display severity level (disclaimer - I might be incorrect). More specifically, I have a constraint on https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7dk/dk-core//StructureDefinition-dk-core-patient.html#constraints named marital-status-unknown-usage that is only of level warning, which it also says in the structure definition. But shouldn't this severity information also be stated in the html view in the table?
It should. Can you submit a Git issue against the publisher?
